1: Push blocks B1, B2, and B4 into special area SA3.
2: Place block B1 in special area SA3.
3: Put block B4 in special area SA1.
4: Move block B2 into special area SA2.
5: Move block B1 into special area SA3.
6: Push all the blocks inside special area SA3.
7: Push blocks B1, B2, and B5 towards special area SA2.
8: Put block B2 in special area SA1.
9: Put blocks B1 and B3 in special area SA1.
10: Move block B2 into special area SA2.
